com.vaadin.addon.charts.model.style
Class Theme

java.lang.Object
  com.vaadin.addon.charts.model.AbstractConfigurationObject
      com.vaadin.addon.charts.model.style.Theme
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
HighChartsDefaultTheme, VaadinTheme
public class Theme
extends AbstractConfigurationObject

Theme class for Chart. This is empty theme, and only defines the structure of Theme. Inherit own Theme class, or use Themes inherited from this class to theme your Charts.

See Also:
VaadinTheme, Serialized Form
